description: [``botocore``] The Amazon AppIntegrations service adds a set of APIs (in preview) to manage third party applications to be used in Amazon Connect agent workspace.
[``botocore``] This release allows an App Runner customer to specify a custom source directory to run the build & start command. This change allows App Runner to support monorepo based repositories
[``botocore``] CodeDeploy now supports In-place and Blue/Green EC2 deployments with multiple Classic Load Balancers and multiple Target Groups.
[``botocore``] This release updates a set of Amazon Connect APIs that provides the ability to integrate third party applications in the Amazon Connect agent workspace.
[``botocore``] Amazon DynamoDB now supports Incremental Export as an enhancement to the existing Export Table
[``botocore``] The release includes AWS verified access to support FIPs compliance in North America regions
[``botocore``] This release adds three new API support "CreateLakeFormationOptIn", "DeleteLakeFormationOptIn" and "ListLakeFormationOptIns", and also updates the corresponding documentation.
[``botocore``] Update documentation for RemoveAttributes to more accurately reflect its behavior when attributes are deleted.
[``botocore``] This release adds a new field COMPLETED to the ReplicationStatus Enum. You can now use this field to validate the replication status of S3 objects using the AWS SDK.
